snippet: The fourth-quarter earnings of 53 cents a share, bolstered by growth in G.E.’s industrial businesses and an improving United States economy, were in line with expectations.
abstract: General Electric reports net earnings of $4.2 billion in fourth quarter, compared with $4.01 billion a year earlier; company had earnings of 53 cents a share, in line with analysts expectations; quarterly revenue was $40.38 billion, up 3 percent from year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The fourth-quarter earnings of 53 cents a share, bolstered by growth in G.E.’s industrial businesses and an improving United States economy, were in line with expectations.

headline.main: General Electric’s Industrial Segments Lift Earnings
headline.print_headline: General Electric’s Industrial Segments Lift Earnings
